prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with striking yellow fur and a powerful stance.
Generate a large feline creature that harnesses the power of lightning in its moves.
Imagine a Pokemon that glows with electric energy, showcasing a muscular build.
Design a legendary beast with a sleek body, sharp features, and vibrant colors.
Give me a majestic creature that roams the mountains and commands thunder.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies speed and agility, with a striking color palette.
Make a fearsome electric Pokemon that has a distinctive mane and fierce expression.
